item.title: At least 568 killed after 7.9 magnitude powerful quake hits Turkey, Syria | Pics
item.description: At least 568 people died after a 7.9 magnitude earthquake hit central Turkey and northwest Syria in the early hours of Monday. Hundreds of people are feared trapped in rubble following the disaster, the impact of which was felt in Cyprus and Lebanon as well. As officials mount a frantic rescue operation, Turkey has issued a 'Level 4' alarm, which also calls for international assistance, news agency Reuters reported. At least 20 aftershocks were felt, with the strongest measuring 6.6 on the Richter scale, Turkish authorities said. In Syria, the earthquake hit a region also inhabited by around four million people displaced from other parts of the country. Prime minister Narendra Modi and US president Joe Biden have offered condolences and assured Turkey of all possible assistance to cope with this tragedy.

item.title: 65th Grammy Awards: Taylor Swift to Beyonce and Doja Cat to Camila Cabello, who wore what at the Grammys 2023
item.description: 65th Grammy Awards: The Grammys saw the biggest names in attendance, including Beyoncé, Taylor Swift, Doja Cat, Camila Cabello, Cardi B, Anoushka Shankar, Viola Davis, Harry Styles, Benny Blanco, and several other celebrities. Check out all the pictures inside and who wore what to the ceremony.

item.title: Grammy Awards 2023: Best and worst looks from the red carpet

item.title: Karisma Kapoor’s T-shirt and denim look is the ultimate weekend vibe check
item.description: Karisma tucked her oversized black T-shirt into her jeans, and carried a black leather sling bag, as she posed for the cameras.

item.title: Priyanka Chopra's skiing trip with Malti, Nick Jonas and friends is all about slaying winter fashion. All pics here
item.description: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas, with their daughter Malti Marie and friends, went to Aspen for a skiing trip. The star posted pictures from the holiday and nailed winter fashion like a true fashionista in a check-print ensemble.

item.title: Kriti Sanon looks effortlessly chic in a multi-coloured floral midi dress
item.description: Kriti Sanon added a splash of colours to our screens with her radiant look in a beautiful midi length dress, as she posed for the photoshoot, while promoting her upcoming film Shehzada. Check out all pics inside.

item.title: How to have a good relationship: Expert shares tips
item.description: When we look at the current version of our partners, we should be able to imagine a future with them. This will give us more clarity on the prospect of the relationship in future.

item.title: Indian Army chief Gen Manoj Pande meets Royal Cambodian Army Commander to boost defence ties | Pics
item.description: Army chief General Manoj Pande met Commander of Royal Cambodian Army Lt General Hun Manet in New Delhi on Friday in a bid to strengthen the bilateral defence cooperation between the two nations.  The Defence ministry termed the Cambodian official’s visit a ‘milestone’ in the defence relations between India-Cambodia since this was the maiden trip by any Commander of the Royal Cambodian Army. A ceremonial reception and Guard of Honour was accorded to Manet who also holds the position of Deputy Commander-in-Chief, Royal Cambodian Armed Forces. The two officials signed the ‘Terms of Reference’ for staff talks between the two armies and General Pande also extended India’s support to the southeast Asian nation by offering customised training modules for its army.
